snippet: Devon Daniels, 30, was indicted on four counts of accessing a computer database without authorization and four counts of making false statements to federal agents.
abstract: New York City Police Officer Devon Daniels, accused of providing protected law enforcement information to the head of a drug-dealing organization in Queens, is indicted on four counts of accessing a computer database without authorization and four counts of making false statements to federal agents.
lead_paragraph: Devon Daniels, 30, was indicted on four counts of accessing a computer database without authorization and four counts of making false statements to federal agents.

headline.seo: New York Police Officer Accused of Aiding Drug Dealer Indicted
headline.main: Officer Charged With Aiding Drug Ring
headline.print_headline: Officer Charged With Aiding Drug Ring
